com.cs421.rccar.UI
Class MasterButtonActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.cs421.rccar.UI.MasterButtonActivity

public class MasterButtonActivity
extends Activity

This class handles inupt from the user via control buttons on the screen. The activity passes control commands from the user to the Master.java class. This activity can change the UI to MasterAccelerometerActivity.

Author:
David Widen, Jessie Young, Thomas Cheng
